name: places/ChIJkSLrlA5ZwokRfc2Nl2teUto
adrFormatAddress: 1722 1st Ave., New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Got a pedicure here and the ladies are super nice and respectful. The only thing that is a negative is that they are overpriced. Paid $55 for pedicure that could’ve been easily been $35 at other salons. Did the lady do a good job? Yes but I don’t think I will go back just because of the price.

text.text: Got a pedicure here and the ladies are super nice and respectful. The only thing that is a negative is that they are overpriced. Paid $55 for pedicure that could’ve been easily been $35 at other salons. Did the lady do a good job? Yes but I don’t think I will go back just because of the price.

originalText.text: Would not recommend the place at all. I did regular pedicure and gel extension. First of all the price is outragious and the result is not even worth it. I paid $128 for gel extension and its the worst I've ever gotten in my life. Its all old korean ladies working They are nice and all but i dont think they really know the work for extensions. And for pedicure she didnt even scrub my legs just color and wash thats all. Never going back again.

text.text: Would not recommend the place at all. I did regular pedicure and gel extension. First of all the price is outragious and the result is not even worth it. I paid $128 for gel extension and its the worst I've ever gotten in my life. Its all old korean ladies working They are nice and all but i dont think they really know the work for extensions. And for pedicure she didnt even scrub my legs just color and wash thats all. Never going back again.

originalText.text:
Professional and welcoming staff. The setup is nice, simple, and clean.

I went for a gel manicure and had an overall great experience. They have a wide selection of colors to choose from and the staff is super friendly. I have sensitive cuticles so I greatly appreciated how gentle my manicurist was, and she was also very attentive to detail. I’m loving the finished result!

Also the mini massage I got while waiting for my nails to dry felt incredible - definitely have to try out their massage services next time.

Great place, will absolutely be going back.

originalText.text: They are the best!!  Love how they remember everything you like done and get to know you personally.  Very professional, clean and so courteous.  I have chronic medical issues and the massages relax me and put me almost to sleep.  My daughter lives near by so I always make me time every month during my visits.  Highly recommend.

text.text: They are the best!!  Love how they remember everything you like done and get to know you personally.  Very professional, clean and so courteous.  I have chronic medical issues and the massages relax me and put me almost to sleep.  My daughter lives near by so I always make me time every month during my visits.  Highly recommend.

originalText.text: DO NOT GO! I have literally no idea why this place has good reviews. First of all you walk up and the awning has a different nail salon name on it. Second of all, they overcharge. They were soooo rough w my nails they left scabs on my cuticles. Maybe this place is fine for a basic gel mani but not for acrylics. They tried to remove my acrylics with a basic nail file. Then they used a METROCARD to try and lift the acrylic after one soak. Then they decided to use nail clippers to clip it off and literally cut through 2 of my natural nails. No apology at all. As I said they tore up my cuticles too. Worst part was, they do not do traditional acrylics. They just put on a tip and dip it in powder 2x. That is not strong enough. My nails broke in 1 week. Got charged $168 for this. At the end I alerted them that I had scabs on my fingers. They pretended to be shocked and then put some rubbing alcohol on my fingers. At the end, knowing they hurt me, they still had the nerve to ask for a tip.
